meanings.definition: (adjective) of, relating to, or denoting a disease that is temporarily prevalent and widespread among animals in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The epizootic illness spread quickly through the herd of cows.
meanings.sent2: The epizootic outbreak affected various species of birds in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The epizootic bug seemed to be having a party in the barnyard!
meanings.sent4: The epizootic wave swept through the animal kingdom like a storm.
meanings.sent5: The epizootic disease was like a wildfire, spreading rapidly among the wildlife.

meanings.definition: (noun) an outbreak of disease affecting many animals of one kind at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The epizootic caused a significant decline in the deer population.
meanings.sent2: The epizootic among the fish in the pond was concerning to the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The epizootic at the zoo made the monkeys the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The epizootic was a dark cloud looming over the farm animals.
meanings.sent5: The epizootic outbreak was like a wave crashing through the animal community.
